name: Fight or Fright (RustyMonky)
description:
Fight or Fright

You play as Timmy, an unfortunate youth armed with an infinitely stocked pistol against endless waves of Skeletons on Halloween night. You must fight them -- and your fear -- to survive. The more frightened you become, the worse your aim and surrounding light. The longer you live and the more skeletons you destroy, the better!

This game was made as a submission for devtober 2018. While the guidelines state that the game should raise $1 to be deemed a "success", payment is not required but greatly appreciated! Thanks for your support!
